page.title: 07Highcliffe Comprehensive II
page.content: In the third year an option for German and Latin is added. Fourth and Fifth Year pupils all follow courses in English, Maths, Physical Education and Personal Studies for a total of 16 lessons per week. Pupils then nominate 6 optional subjects from a wide choice of exam subjects.Each option has 4 lessons per week. All pupils are expected to do homework. Examination pupils are expected to do 40 minutes per subject per week. Extra curricular activities are plentiful. During the school day pupils can take instrumental lessons including brass, woodwind, percussion, and string instruments. The school has a musical production every term which is combined with a school play in the spring term.
